name: Vis (Red Lily Games)
description:
The Undying City

It had been years since the Undying City last remembered its name. Abandoned years ago, no one knows what caused its downfall. No one knows the story of how it fell from grace and life. And now, no one remembers what the city was once called. No one… except the mysterious beings known as the Scio.

Enter Avi. A new member of a clandestine group that investigates cases involving the supernatural, he and his team seek to get to the bottom of this. To do this, he must find and speak to the survivors that still reside in the Undying City.

But once he begins his task, he soon finds there is more to unravel than they realized.

---

Vis is a short story prototype made for the SCREAMORTALITY jam.
